lead_paragraph: Portugal beat Poland, 5-3, in a shootout after regulation goals by Poland’s Robert Lewandowski and Portugal’s Ricardo Quaresma.

headline.kicker: Portugal 1, Poland 1 | Portugal wins on penalty kicks, 5-3 | European Championships Quarterfinal
headline.print_headline: Portugal Advances With a Teenager’s Help
headline.main: With a Teenager’s Help, Portugal Edges Poland to Win a Euros Quarterfinal
headline.content_kicker: Portugal 1, Poland 1 | Portugal wins on penalty kicks, 5-3 | European Championships Quarterfinal

snippet: Portugal beat Poland, 5-3, in a shootout after regulation goals by Poland’s Robert Lewandowski and Portugal’s Ricardo Quaresma....
abstract: Portugal defeats Poland in penalty kicks after 1-1 draw, to advance to semifinals of European Championships.
